attributes.action: stop ignoring the puplic on just about every issue it is involved in .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems that this government (although most have been similar) has a cavalier attitude to all but themselves and totally ignores the wishes of the public on most issues namely the enviorment,housing and siting airports and other noise and dirt generating schemes, therefore I/we call for a more listening government.

rejection.details: Please give an explicit action for HM Government on a point of policy
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
